titleStmt.title: A letter agreed unto and subscribed by the gentlemen, ministers, freeholders and seamen of the county of Suffolk Presented to the Right Honorable, the Lord Mayor, Aldermen, and Common Councell of the Citty of London. Assembled, January 30th 1659.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
